title: Necessary addition to the Mafia faction.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Do anything that the host decides a Mafia role should be able to do.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - At the beginning of the game, the host must, in an non-game channel, say the ability of this role with no context. (They can also conveniently decide to do this on their own free will even if this role isn't in the game!)
